body:
Branding

AaveGHO

We helped Aave brand their stablecoin GHO - a game-changing addition to the crypto landscape, offering much-needed transparency and security in an otherwise noisy market. While crypto embodies maximalism and hype, the GHO identity reflects transparency, honesty, and security. Encapsulated in a beautiful and calm design system, GHO set a new standard for the future of digital currency—one of trust.

CLIENT
AAVE
SERVICES

DESIGN
2022

Work
Info

Info

Fucking good fucking.

We will blow your mind. And more.

About us

A

Studio A-2is a Digital Design Studio founded by the Creative Directors; Jonas Emmertsen & Steffen Christiansen. Driven by the notion that life is only about twenty-eight thousand days long, we work with teams & talent across the globe to make memorable experiences that push the possibilities of Design, Technology & Storytelling.

Services

B

  • SPRINTS

    We paint the big picture within a small time frame. You provide the problem. We develop a solution. We offer various Creative Sprints — all short engagements that take you from Concept to Prototype in just a few weeks. Ready, set, sprint!

    ◦ Product Innovation
    ◦ Concept Sprint
    ◦ Design Sprint
    ◦ Tech Discovery

  • BRANDING

    Most people spend more than 6 hours on screen in a day. That's why we built Brands born for the Digital Era. Balancing Expression and Utility, we design Identity Systems fit for the biggest screens and the smallest buttons.

    ◦ Brand Strategy
    ◦ Concept
    ◦ Tone & Voice
    ◦ Design Direction
    ◦ Design Production
    ◦ Brand Guidelines

  • DIGITAL EXPERIENCES

    In a sea of sameness, we help brands make lasting impressions by telling memorable stories across the web with interactive experiences. Mixing original ideas, meaningful design, and a pinch of purposeful animation, we create experiences that tickle the brain, please the eye, or even crack a smile.

    ◦ Content Strategy & IA
    ◦ Concept
    ◦ User Experience
    ◦ Design Direction
    ◦ Design Production
    ◦ Development

  • PRODUCTS & PLATFORMS

    A good Product makes it easy to get the job done. A great Product solves your problems in ways that feel like magic. We help brands build Products that solve problems and do so in memorable ways that spark joy, are worth your time, and make you wonder if wizards were involved.

    ◦ Product Strategy & IA
    ◦ Concept
    ◦ User Experience
    ◦ Design Direction
    ◦ Design Production
    ◦ Development

Our Principles

D.1
01 — 07
  • 01

    HAVE FUN, SERIOUSLY!

    If you’re not having fun making it, nobody else will enjoy using it.

  • 02

    SEEK THE UNEXPECTED

    Surprise yourself, your team, and your client. Challenge the brief and present a direction different from what one would expect.

  • 03

    KEEP IT NIMBLE

    Staff your projects with as small a team as possible. Too many cooks in the kitchen ruin the food.

  • 04

    CREATIVITY LEADS

    We are a creatively led business, and we measure and structure our company as such.

  • 05

    MAKE PROCESSES FUN

    Gamify work processes to make daily life more fun and inspiring.

  • 06

    CHALLENGE THE RULES

    The internet is too young to be defined. What was best practice yesterday is irrelevant tomorrow. Don’t always stick to rules of the past.

  • 07

    BALANCE MAKES BETTER

    Life outside of A-2is as important as the inside. There’s a new day tomorrow, and a rested mind creates better ideas.

D.2
08 — 14
  • 08

    TALENTS OVER TITLES

    Titles are cool, but skills are cooler. Cast teams based on people’s skills, not the words on their business cards.

  • 09

    WORK IN UNISON

    Don’t pass off the baton. Carry your projects and problems together. Collaborate, solve, and develop better solutions.

  • 10

    DON’T OVERCOMPLICATE IT

    Don’t waste people’s time with unnecessary complexity. If a Process can be done better simply, do it. The job is not to be in meetings; it’s to create, concentrate and carry the project forward.

  • 11

    BE PROFESSIONAL, STAY PERSONABLE

    We’re serious about work but seriously not interested in working with corporate duds. Be your whole self. We don’t judge.

  • 12

    LEAVE THE AGENDA AT CITY HALL

    Curiosity and collaboration die with politics. Wanna be a politician? Cool, we’ll recommend you at City Hall.

  • 13

    TAKE CRITICISM POSITIVELY

    Our work is not a reflection of ourselves, no matter how much of ourselves we put into it. Turn feedback into better work.

  • 14

    CHANGE YOUR MIND

    You are not opinions. With new information comes new perspectives. Discovering you are wrong is one step closer to being right.

D.3
15 — 21
  • 15

    KEEP LEARNING

    Don’t ever think you’ve reached perfection. There’s always room for growth. Keep pursuing knowledge till the day you’re gone.

  • 16

    EMBRACE DEBATE

    Have opinions, and be open to other views than yours. Debate is not arguing. We can all learn something new.

  • 17

    SHOW BEST INTENT

    People and cultures are different. Be curious, learn, and put forward your best intentions. People are not out to get you.

  • 18

    SHARE KNOWLEDGE

    Suppose it’s a link, a recourse, a podcast, or a book. Share it! The person next to you might get more value than yourself.

  • 19

    SHAPE YOUR FUTURE

    Projects are diamonds in the rough. It’s your responsibility to shape them into gems.

  • 20

    SILENCE AFTER SIX

    When we leave work physically, we also leave work digitally. Having time OFF means better time ON.

  • 21

    UNKNOWN FORMULAR

    The secret to success can’t be broken down into a formula. Find success by breaking your comfort zone and navigating the unknown.

D.4
22 — 28
  • 22

    IT’S A MATTER OF ANGLE

    Find a new angle on an old problem. There is nothing an audience won’t care about as long as you interest them.

  • 23

    THINK IN MOTION

    People live lives in a sequence; therefore, we make storyboards instead of wireframes.

  • 24

    EXPERIMENT

    Have an idea but not sure how to get there? Experiment, learn from failure, and know results will eventually come.

  • 25

    FORM IS FUNCTION. FUNCTION IS FORM

    We don’t separate Creative from UX. Design as a discipline is the holistic combination of form & function. Our team operates holistically.

  • 26

    NO COMMITTEES

    Decisions can be hard, but no good decision ever comes from a committee. Embrace debate and know that the lead has the final call.

  • 27

    IDEAS ARE TO BE MADE

    Do you sometimes get a good idea but don’t have the time to make it? Pitch it, and let’s make it happen.

  • 28

    DON’T RINSE & REPEAT. THINK & PROCEED

    Just because it worked last time is not a guarantee it will work again. Always consider the context before the method.

SEE ALL (28)

\/girls\/madklubben.title: A-2— Madklubben – Digital Restaurant Portal for Denmark’s Biggest Collective | A-2
\/girls\/madklubben.html:
Platform

MadklubbenRestaurant Portal

Madklubben, Denmark’s largest restaurant collective with over 35 restaurants across the country, partnered with Studio A-2to create a seamless and engaging digital experience. The new platform consolidates Madklubben’s diverse culinary offerings, making it effortless for users to explore, browse, and book tables, all while maintaining the brand’s renowned quality and user-focused service. With a design that reflects Scandinavian minimalism and functionality, Studio A-2ensured the site delivers a cohesive, intuitive, and hunger-satisfying journey from start to finish. Bon appétit!

VISIT SITE

\/girls\/espn-year-in-review.title: A-2— ESPN Year In Review 2022 – Celebrating a Year of Sports | A-2
\/girls\/espn-year-in-review.html:
Website

ESPNYear In Review

Studio A-2partnered with ESPN to create the Year in Review 2022, an immersive digital experience highlighting the most memorable moments in sports. Featuring stunning photography, video highlights, and interactive elements, the platform lets fans relive the year’s major triumphs and emotional setbacks. The project celebrates sporting excellence, from global championships to personal victories, while providing engaging trivia and interactive features that keep users entertained throughout. This digital experience captures the dynamic energy and passion of sports, elevating the storytelling of ESPN’s iconic sports yearbook.

VISIT SITE

\/girls\/ovechkin-800.title: A-2— ESPN Ovechkin800 – Interactive Journey to a Hockey Milestone | A-2
\/girls\/ovechkin-800.html:
Website

ESPNOvechkin800

Studio A-2collaborated with ESPN to create Ovechkin800, an immersive interactive documentary celebrating Alexander Ovechkin’s historic journey to his 800th NHL goal. Through a dynamic and interactive timeline, the platform highlights Ovechkin’s career milestones, featuring engaging statistics, career-defining moments, and in-depth insights into his playing style, teammates, and key rivals. Designed to captivate hockey fans, this experience provides an interactive look at one of the greatest players in NHL history, celebrating Ovechkin’s legacy through modern, user-driven storytelling.

VISIT SITE

ESPN

\/girls\/ooono.title: A-2— OOONO – Driving Safety Innovation with A-2 | A-2
\/girls\/ooono.html:
Branding

OOONOSafer Everyday

OOONO is dedicated to making roads safer, one gadget at a time. By removing distractions, their products bring your eyes away from your phone, and onto the road. As part of the launch of their “co-driver 2” we created a cohesive brand experience that mirrors the simplicity and safety of the product. Studio A-2ensured that both the device and its branding help keep drivers focused on the road.

\/girls\/everbloom.title: A-2— Everbloom – Designing the EverGrid for Evolving Brand Identity | A-2
\/girls\/everbloom.html:
Branding

EverbloomThe Ever Grid

Everbloom is on a mission — a pursuit of turning passion and self-expression into opportunity. Never-ending and forever evolving. Like forever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever, ever. We collaborated with Everbloom to create the EverGrid, an open-ended, creative framework for brand Identity.

\/girls\/espn-carlos-alcaraz.title: A-2— ESPN x Carlos Alcaraz – Celebrating Tennis’ Rising Star | A-2
\/girls\/espn-carlos-alcaraz.html:
Website

ESPNCarlos Alcaraz

A dynamic digital journey capturing the meteoric rise of tennis sensation Carlos Alcaraz during the 2023 season, where he faced tennis icons Federer, Djokovic, and Nadal. Our Scandinavian design approach brings to life the young Spaniard’s unrelenting drive and determination on the court, as he challenges the legends of the sport. This project illustrates the generational clash and pursuit of greatness with modern, minimalistic aesthetics, ensuring an engaging user experience that echoes the intensity of Alcaraz’s journey.

\/girls\/augen.title: A-2— Augen Pro – Innovating AI Wearables with A-2 | A-2
\/girls\/augen.html:
Website

Augen ProAI Wearables

Augen Pro focuses on building wearables and implants, pushing the boundaries of technology and innovation. Their creations merge simplistic design with advanced functionality, revolutionizing how we interact with the world around us. For their website, we aimed to capture Augen Pro's visionary philosophy by designing an immersive experience that reflects the intricacies of their products. Every aspect of the site is crafted to tell the story of Augen Pro's innovative approach and the transformative impact their products will have on our lives.

\/girls\/kriss-ai.title: A-2— Kriss AI
\/girls\/kriss-ai.html:
Website

Kriss.aiAI Sales Tool

For Kriss.ai, we transformed the dental experience with AI-powered solutions that streamline patient care, from managing appointments to enhancing communication. The newly designed site showcases this innovative approach, making every touchpoint—whether in the clinic or online—feel effortless and intuitive. By focusing on user-centered design and seamless interactions, Kriss.ai is reducing waiting room anxiety and reshaping the future of dentistry. Discover how AI is elevating dental patient care to new heights with Kriss.ai’s intuitive platform.

\/girls\/wrk.title: A-2— WRK Timepieces – Luxury Craftsmanship Meets Innovation | A-2
\/girls\/wrk.html:
Website

WRKTimepieces

WRK Timepieces is renowned for its commitment to crafting luxury timepieces. Their artisans meticulously create each piece, combining traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge innovation. Utilizing premium materials such as titanium and DLC (Diamond-Like Carbon), WRK Timepieces produces watches that epitomize precision engineering and timeless elegance. For their website, we wanted to transfer WRK’s philosophy around design and innovation to reflect every little detail of the site and how we tell the story of each individual timepiece.

\/girls\/dumpling-tv.title: A-2— Aave Dumpling.TV – Quirky Web3 Video Platform | A-2
\/girls\/dumpling-tv.html:
Website

AaveDumpling.TV

We collaborated with Aave to launch Dumpling.lol, one of the internet’s quirkiest video platforms, designed to promote Aave’s Lens Protocol. Inspired by pirate radio and powered by web3, Dumpling.lol highlights the best of user-owned content across decentralized networks. We crafted a playful yet minimalistic platform that reflects our focus on innovative user experiences and digital storytelling for the evolving web3 ecosystem.
